item.title: SML EzPlex Real Time PCR Testing Kit
item.description: SML EzPlex Real Time PCR Testing Kit Real Time PCR Testing Kit The Ezplex 2019-nCoV Realtime PCR Kit is devised for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV2 virus using RNA extracted from oropharynx and nasopharynx specimens of the patients through Real-time Polymerase Chain Reaction. The real-time PCR allows for rapid and easy testing of 96 samples and users can check test results conveniently with the software included in this kit.

item.description: Surgical Mask (3-ply) 3-ply Surgical Mask 3 Layer of protection Non woven outer layer Breathable and comfortable: Low breathing resistance Comfortable ear-loop: Comfortable elastic ear-loop, extra-soft ear loops eliminate pressure to the ears. You feel comfortable with periods of time usage. Hidden nose strips: Inset with bendable metal nose strips freely adjust shape according to face shape, Increase facial fit, Adjustable according to nose height.
